data.content: Commit 43357d2: Extended instrumentation.test.ts from 2 to 11 tests covering all branches in src/instrumentation.ts. Coverage went from 56.52% to 100% (stmts, branches, funcs, lines). Covered: early return for edge runtime, settings changed path (singular + plural), registry changed path, error reporting for both backfills, catch blocks for Error and non-Error values. All 979 tests pass, lint and typecheck clean.
